MonsterTrait.Name: Focused Animosity
MonsterTrait.Text: The wampus cat has advantage on melee attacks against any male she has seen employ divine magic or wield a holy symbol.

MonsterTrait.Name: Innate Spellcasting
MonsterTrait.Text: The wampus cat's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 13). She can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: At will: disguise self (appearance of a female human), mage hand 2/day: hex

MonsterTrait.Name: Magic Resistance
MonsterTrait.Text: The wampus cat has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

MonsterAction.Name: Claws
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.

MonsterTrait.Name: Yowl (Recharge 5-6)
MonsterTrait.Text: Intelligent creatures within 60 feet of the cat who are able to hear its voice must make a DC 13 Charisma saving throw. Those who fail find the sound of the wampus cat's voice pleasant and alluring, so that the cat has advantage on Charisma checks against them for 1 minute. The affected characters cannot attack the wampus cat during this time unless they are wounded in that time.
